content.text: Hi! I am a free spirit who loves to express myself through my clothing. My most valued material possession is my stethoscope. I enjoy spending time outdoors, especially on my property. I work at a doctor's office. I'm recently divorced.

Hi, my mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of a ticket. I enjoy cheeseburgers once in a while, but I make sure to get in my daily exercise to stay fit. I enjoy golfing. I'm a Game of Thrones fan who worries about my mom's health. I'm on a keto diet.
I love cheeseburgers too! I also love spending time outdoors. I'm a doctor, so my stethoscope is my most prized possession.
I'm on a keto diet, so I'm not allowed to have cheeseburgers. I'm happy you love them though! What do you like to do outdoors?
I love to go hiking and camping. I also enjoy fishing and swimming.
I love hiking too! I've never gone camping, but I've always wanted to try it. Fishing and swimming sound like fun too.
You should definitely go camping! It's a great way to relax and get away from it all. I've been fishing a few times, but I'm not very good at it. I'm sure you'd be better at it than I am.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll have to try camping sometime soon. I'm sure I'd be better at fishing than you think.
I hope you have fun! Maybe we can go camping together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to go camping with you.
